CATERING PACKAGES

Convenience, for all your corporate and private events

THE WHOLE PACKAGE

Whether it’s for business or pleasure, Indy Fresh Catering offers comprehensive breakfast, lunch and dinner catering packages for all of your corporate and private events. Choosing one of our catering packages is a cost-efficient way to accommodate your group. The minimum order for our affordable packages, which range from $5 to $15 per person, is $150. This setup conveniently includes disposable serving utensils, cutlery, plates, napkins, cups, chafing dishes with warmers and drinks, such as iced tea, lemonade and Coca-Cola. Plus, our menu items are made fresh every day. It’s a no-brainer!


READY TO ORDER? CONTACT US

BREAKFAST PACKAGES

From wraps to buffet, start the day off right with one of Indy Fresh’s breakfast packages. Each comes with orange juice, and coffee is available for $1.25 per person.

  • Breakfast Wraps

    Pre-rolled breakfast wraps come with a choice of bacon, Italian sausage or vegetarian fillings, as well as a variety of Danishes, which can be swapped for a fruit platter for an extra $0.50/person.

    9 / person

  • French Toast Buffet

    Custard-dipped, home-baked cinnamon French toast comes with choice of the following toppings: fresh fruit, chocolate chips or homemade rum caramel and a side of bacon or sausage.

    9 / person

  • Pancake Buffet

    Home-baked buttermilk pancakes are served with maple syrup and a choice of toppings: fresh fruit, chocolate chips or homemade rum caramel and a side of bacon or sausage.

    8 / person

  • All American
    Breakfast

    Traditional scrambled eggs come with house potatoes and bacon or sausage.

    8 / person

LUNCH PACKAGES

You’ll never get bored with our range of lunch packages! What does your group feel like today? Go healthy or go decadent, we’ve got you covered. (All lunch packages are buffet style unless noted as boxed.)

  • Signature Salad

    Our Signature Salad comes with a variety of fresh toppings, including diced turkey or ham (add grilled chicken for $1/person), house-made Italian bread and choice of dressings and drinks.

    11 / person

  • Skinny Box
    Lunch

    This low-carb tortilla wrap—pick the filling from our menu of wraps—comes with a side of crudités and hummus and bottled water.

    10 / person

  • BBQ Lunch

    House-smoked, slow-roasted pulled pork or chicken sandwiches on slider buns comes with two sides and JohnTom's BBQ Sauce. Also enjoy Ghirardelli brownies and drinks.

    10 / person

  • Full Sized Box
    Lunch

    Choose from one of Indy Fresh's distinctive full wraps or 6-inch sandwiches and one side. Also enjoy Ghirardelli brownies and drinks.

    9 / person

  • Soup, Salad, Sandwich
    (Choose 2)

    Select from our delicious soup, salad and sandwich options and one side. This package includes Ghirardelli brownies and drinks.

    11 / person

  • Old School Box
    Lunch

    Choose a half wrap or 4-inch sub with chips or pasta salad and a Ghirardelli brownie.

    5 / person

  • Italian Lunch

    This includes a signature side salad, pasta dish, one of our homemade sauces and one entree. It also comes with fresh-baked Italian bread, Ghirardelli brownies and drinks.

    10 / person

  • Meat & 3 Lunch

    Choose one of our meat entrees and three of our homemade sides. Plus, enjoy Ghirardelli brownies and drinks.

    10 / person

DINNER PACKAGES

Set the scene for a great evening affair with Indy Fresh’s home-style Italian, BBQ or Meat and Three packages. Each option comes with an appetizer, drinks and dessert. You also have the option of splitting the order in half with two dinner entrees!

  • Italian Dinner

    This includes dinner portions of our signature side salad, one appetizer, a pasta dish, two of our homemade sauces and two entrees. It also comes with fresh-baked Italian bread, drinks and a dessert option of either homemade bread pudding or brownies.

    15 / person

  • BBQ Dinner

    This includes dinner portions of our house-smoked, slow-roasted pulled pork or chicken sandwiches on slider buns and comes with two sides and JohnTom's BBQ Sauce. Also enjoy Ghirardelli brownies and drinks.

    15 / person

  • Meat & 3

    This includes dinner portions of two of our meat entrees, one appetizer and three of our homemade sides. Plus, enjoy Ghirardelli brownies and drinks.

    15 / person

DIETARY NEEDS

Does someone in your group have a special dietary need, intolerance or food allergy? Please give us advance notice and will do our best to accommodate them! We have gluten-free, dairy-free, vegan, vegetarian and more options. And please note that all meals will be cooked in the same kitchen facility.

BREAKFAST

  • Breakfast Wrap

    Scrambled eggs, roasted potatoes, shredded cheese and red bell peppers wrapped in a flour tortilla. Your choice of bacon, Italian sausage or vegetarian.

  • French Toast Buffet

    Custard dipped, home baked Italian bread with your choice of the following toppings: bananas, strawberies, blueberries, whip cream, chocolate chips, homemade rum caramel.

  • Pancake Buffet

    Buttermilk pancakes served with maple syrup and your choice of the following toppings: sliced bananas, strawberries, blueberries or chocolate chips.

  • Gourmet Scrambled Eggs

    Spinach, goat cheese, choice of prosciutto or apple wood bacon, vine ripe tomatoes as toppings.

  • Traditional Scrambled Eggs

    Farm fresh eggs with Amish cream, salt, and fresh cracked pepper.

  • Fresh Danish Variety

    Fresh baked chocolate, apple and cinnamon danishes.

    15 (Serves 8 - 10)

  • Fresh Baked Croissants

    Freshly-baked buttered croissants.

  • Greek Vanilla Yogurt & Organic Granola

    Vanilla yogurt with organic rolled oats, nuts and honey with a splash of brown sugar.

  • Fresh Seasonal Fruit Platter

    Platter of seasonal fruit consisting of melons, pineapples, strawberries, etc.

  • 100% Fresh Florida Orange Juice

    Fresh Florida orange juice served by the gallon.

  • 100% Colombian Dark Roast Coffee

    Colombian dark roast coffee served in 8oz cups. Comes with cups, stirrers, creamers, and sweeteners.

APPETIZERS

  • Pinwheel Platter

    Ham, turkey, cheddar cheese, mixed greens, tomatoes, and garlic aioli.

  • Baked Goat Cheese

    Herb rolled Amish goat cheese over our homemade tomato garden and herb sauce with garlic crostini.

  • Caprese Salad

    Mixed greens, diced vine ripe tomatoes, fresh mozzarella, balsamic vinaigrette.

  • Caprese Skewers

    Fresh mozzarella, tomato, basil infused olive oil, balsamic reduction over mixed greens.

  • Bacon Wrapped Meatballs

    Our large sirloin and parmesan herb meatballs wrapped in applewood bacon and slow roasted to perfection.

  • Classic Meatballs

    Hand rolled meatballs rolled with Italian sausage, fresh herbs and parmesan cheese. Slow roasted in our homemade tomato garden and herb sauce.

  • Asian Chicken Skewers

    Marinated and grilled chicken, with sesame Asian glaze.

PLATTERS

  • Crudités w/ Hummus

    Garden fresh vegetables, imported olives, house pickled vegetables, hot peppers. Comes with choice of either garlic or roasted red pepper hummus and home made blue cheese dressing.

  • Domestic Cheese Platter

    Amish Bleu Cheese, ripened Brie, Wisconsin Cheddar, Smoked Gouda, aged Swiss, Cranberry Goat Cheese, fresh berries, and dried figs.

  • Imported Cheese
    Platter

    French Ripened Brie, Danish Bleu, English Cheddar, Fontina, Spanish Manchego.

  • Seasonal Fruit Platter

    Served with flavored Greek yogurt.

BBQ

  • Midwest Sourced Pulled Pork

    House rubbed, slow roasted and smoked pork, with JohnTom’s award winning BBQ sauce.

  • Quartered Chicken

    Miller's Amish Chicken, house smoked and slow roasted whole chicken cut and quartered.

  • Amish Pulled Chicken

    Miller's Amish Chicken, house rubbed, slow roasted and smoked, with JohnTom’s local award winning BBQ sauce.

  • Sausage Links

    Slow roasted, spicy sausage with caramelized onions served on a fresh baked bun.

  • Fresh Smoked Ham

    Need 24 hours before expected delivery. Smithfield all natural cured smoked ham sliced with pineapple and sweet cherry glaze.

  • Fresh Smoked Pork Loin

    Need 24 hours before expected delivery. Smithfield all natural pork loin, slow roasted, paired with with peppercorn demi-glaze.

  • Roasted Red Pepper Tomato Bisque

    Tomato bisque with garden roasted vegetables, sweet Amish cream, and fresh herbs.

  • Creamy Chicken & Wild Rice

    Wild rice, garden vegetables, with a pinch of cayenne.

  • Sausage & Lentil

    Fresh vegetables, organic green lentils, Italian sausage, and fresh herbs.

  • Chicken Noodle Soup

    Traditional creamy chicken noodle soup using fresh vegetables and Amish chicken.

SALADS

  • Signature Salad

    Romaine lettuce and baby greens, tomatoes, cucumbers, red onions, red and yellow peppers, parmesan cheese, fresh garlic croutons, and choice of dressing. Add deli smoked chicken, ham, or turkey for $1.00 per person.

  • Baby Spinach Salad

    Baby spinach and baby greens, roasted red peppers, fresh berries, vine ripe tomatoes, toasted walnuts, goat cheese, sundried tomato vinaigrette.

  • Caprese Salad

    Mixed greens, diced vine ripe tomatoes, diced fresh mozzarella, sliced strawberries, balsamic vinaigrette.

  • Asian Chicken Salad

    Marinated grilled chicken, mixed greens, carrots, cilantro slaw, cashews, sesame dressing.

  • Three Bean Salad & Baby Greens

    Chic peas, red and white beans, cilantro, sweet bell peppers, chili peppers, lemon herb dressing over mixed baby greens.

SANDWICHES & WRAPS

  • Classic Italian

    Midwestern brown sugar ham, salami and pepperoni with mixed greens, vine ripe tomato, yellow onion, lemon herb dressing on fresh baked Italian grinder bread.

  • Authentic Italian

    Thinly sliced Maestro Italian Prosciutto di Parma with aged sliced provolone, mixed baby greens, virgin olive oil and herb seasoning, served on fresh baked Italian bread.

  • Turkey Avocado

    Oven roasted turkey, vine ripe tomatoes, red onion, fresh mozzarella, mixed greens, roasted garlic aioli.

  • Turkey Club

    Oven roasted turkey, applewood bacon, mixed greens, vine ripe tomatoes, roasted garlic aioli.

  • Turkey & Ham

    Oven roasted turkey, brown sugar ham, mixed greens, provolone, lemon herb dressing.

  • Chicken Bacon Ranch

    Marinated roasted chicken breast, baby greens, applewood bacon, cheddar and ranch.

  • Chicken Caesar

  • Veggie & Herb

    Grilled yellow squash, zucchini, red peppers and portobello mushrooms, fresh mozzarella, mixed baby greens, balsamic dressing.

    Salad

    Beans
